title: ArDrive
description: ArDrive offers never-ending storage of your most valuable files. Pay once and save your memories forever.

title: Irys
description: Irys (previously Bundlr) is a reliable multichain solution for Arweave. A network supporting infinite scale on Arweave and cross chain storage in any crypto. It enables users to scale permanent data and precisely attribute its origin.

title: Akord
description: Akord offers digital vaults on Arweave though a web app, as well as an API and CLI for developers to build on AkordJS which is open source. You can store files privately and publicly, as well as mint Atomic NFTs.

title: Lenstube
description: Decentralised video-sharing social media platform, built with Lens Protocol 🌿. Videos are permanently stored on Arweave using Bundlr.

title: Orbis
description: Orbis is a decentralized social network built on Ceramic and Arweave. Start sharing posts without having to pay any transaction fees 🎉

title: Paragraph
description: Paragraph combines the best parts of web2 and web3 to empower creators with a censorship-resistant, privacy-first, blazing-fast blog & newsletter platform.

title: SCAR
description: An Arweave Explorer and Toolkit on the Permaweb.

title: Fora
description: Social Web 3 built on Solana & Arweave. Earn on every action. User Owned. Uncensored.

title: Glosseta
description: Glosseta is a decentralized, open-source glossary meant to help people explore and learn the terminology behind web3.

title: Evermore
description: File storage app that allows you to save your data to Arweave. Pay a small fee to upload then access your data anytime for FREE no subscription.

title: The Graph
description: Making blockchain data easily accessible. The Graph is a web3 protocol for indexing and querying blockchain data with GraphQL.

title: Sarcophagus
description: A Decentralized Dead Man’s Switch. Sarcophagus is an autonomous, incentivized application built on Ethereum and Arweave.

title: Pianity
description: Pianity is a music NFT platform where musicians and their community gather to create, share, trade and collect limited-edition tracks.

title: Gridacity
description: An alliance of like-minded industry veterans creating Games and Interactive media fully on-chain!

title: Releap
description: Releap is a Web3 music NFT platform built on Solana and Arweave that aims to be the go-to place for musicians to  connect with their fans, as well as to monetise their music.

title: DeChat
description: DeChat is a censorship resistant discussion platform.

title: Arweave Wallet
description: Self-custodial Arweave wallet. The Arweave web wallet is the tool to manage tokens from the browser, upload permanent data, and interact with the weave. A browser-based app that can turn any offline device into an Arweave cold storage hardware wallet.

title: Finnie
description: Finnie is the official companion wallet of the Koii Network, enabling you to create, store, and manage digital assets that will stand the test of time.

title: everPay
description: Real-time financial protocol for blockchains made by everFinance. Supports AR cross-chain to ethereum and transactional exchanges between multiple counterparties.

title: Ownbase
description: Ownbase is an evidentiary repository service. It combines Arweave with an easy-to-use tool to simplify labor-intensive manual proofing processes.

title: ArPending
description: Display pending transactions on the Arweave network. Monitor price and search transactions.

title: everFinance
description: Decentralized financial services for everyone, everywhere. Built everPay, Permaswap and toolkits for blockchain developers.

title: Meson
description: Meson, bandwidth marketplace, is the bottom-up paradigm in building the network infrastructure for Web3.

title: 4EVERLAND
description: A Web3 cloud computing platform with global acceleration, privacy protection, distributed storage, and other technical features.

title: Metaweave
description: Metaweave is a cypherpunk social ecosystem censorship resistant, decentralized & permanent designed to allow you to directly interact with the Blockweave using your Arweave wallet.

title: ar.io
description: The ar.io network aims to democratize and enhance the Arweave Gateway, so you can own and operate a front door to the permaweb.

title: KYVE
description: KYVE is an initiative to store any data stream, with built-in validation. By leveraging the Arweave blockchain, we can permanently and immutably store this data.

title: Permaswap
description: An Omnipresent 100% Permanent and 0% slippage Peer-to-Peer exchange that's built on Arweave.

title: EthSign
description: EthSign is building the interface between Web2 and Web3 by connecting legal agreement and smart contract. Open-sourced infrastructures and scenario-specific applications.

title: ViewBlock
description: Arweave Block Explorer. Chain-agnostic explorers and various other easy-to-use tools to help crypto adoption.

title: Arweave Fees
description: Approximate real-time cost to store data permanently on Arweave.

title: SonAR
description: All the data indexed by Warp Gateway - a fast and reliable way to load SmartWeave transactions - can be viewed in SonAR.

title: Redstone
description: Oracles offering custom, high-frequency, cost-efficient data for DeFi | Creators of on Arweave.

title: ASearch
description: A search protocol built on WEB 3.0 that provides indexing capabilities for Arweave, turning it from a storage database into a user-accessible Internet.

title: Metaplex
description: Metaplex empowers creators and builders with tools to launch NFT apps on Solana.

title: Darkblock
description: NFT content access controls for the creator economy. Decentralized protocol for unlockables. Encrypt exclusive content that only the NFT owner can see.

title: OLTA
description: OLTA is a platform to discover, interact and alter immersive art. Interactive NFT’s offer the role of participation with digital art.

title: ArWiki
description: A decentralized wiki for Arweave docs. ArWiki is a Web3 platform that powers Arweave wiki.

title: Warp Academy
description: Warp Academy was created from the need for having a reliable source of knowledge about smart contracts on Arweave.

title: ARcademy
description: Arcademy is community-driven and developed learning platform, for the Arweave ecosystem. You can learn to code, design, and build with the Arweave blockchain.

title: Only Arweave
description: Only Arweave is dedicated to providing learning experiences for both builders and internet explorers. The Permweb needs every background and perspective in order to flourish.

title: CommunityXYZ
description: Dashboard and governance platform for all of the Profit Sharing Communities that are built on top of Arweave.

title: talentDAO
description: talentDAO is a community of organizational scientists, strategists and researchers building the world's first decentralized community-reviewed publication protocol.

title: AFTR Market
description: AFTR Market provides treasury management and governance on-chain for Arweave assets.

title: Glass
description: Home of Video NFTs. The first community-owned video platform.

title: Mirror
description: The essential web3 toolkit for sharing and funding anything. From writing about your latest idea, to building a home for the next big DAO.

title: Verto Exchange
description: Verto is a decentralized trading protocol built on top of Arweave.

title: PermawebNews
description: Community-driven news organization covering Arweave and web3.

title: Kwil
description: Kwil is the first decentralized, community owned SQL database solution for building advanced dApps and protocols.

title: MyMailProtocol
description: Decentralized email stored on Arweave, when you want. Plus you can interact with standard email addresses you already have.

title: Weve
description: Weve is the first mail network with an immutable privacy policy. It can never sell your data, read your mail, or be taken down.

title: Weavemail
description: Weavemail is a prototype decentralised mail system. It runs on the Arweave network and messages itself are always available on the permaweb.

title: Spheron
description: Spheron Protocol is an all-in-one decentralized platform for automating modern dapps. Deploying, scaling, and serving personalized content on decentralized networks.

title: Textury
description: Textury is a decentralized profit sharing community, we create libraries and tools for over 5,000 developers and founders that use the Arweave ecosystem.

title: ArDrive ArFS
description: Arweave File System (ArFS) is a data modeling, storage, and retrieval protocol designed to emulate common file system operations and provide mutability aspects to your data hierarchy on the Arweave platform.

title: Ricardian Fabric
description: A framework built on Arweave and Harmony that implements Ricardian Contracts and you can deploy No-Code DeFi apps and earn by contributing to the builder guild.

title: Warp Contracts
description: Data-driven smart contracts on Arweave crafted by Redstone. Separate data storage from computation.

title: 3em
description: A blazingly fast, secure, reliable, multi-language execution environment for smart contracts inside the Arweave ecosystem.

title: Point Network
description: A collection of software tools allowing you to get access to Web 3.0. Point Network decentralized all main components of the modern internet: decentralized domains (.point), storage & identities.

title: The Platform
description: An incubator for Web 3.0 publishing with a focus on the edges.

title: Open Web Foundry
description: The Open Web Foundry is a program dedicated to help early-stage projects building on Arweave : bring their ideas to life and their MVP’s to market.

title: DSocial
description: Decentralized & censorship resistant video network. 100% on chain.

title: ArVerify
description: ArVerify is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) for verifying addresses on Arweave.

title: decent.land
description: decent.land is a set of web3 social protocols for identity, DAO governance and social networking. Built on Arweave, decent.land stores all data on-chain - immutable and permanent.

title: Arweave Name Service (ANS)
description: Arweave Names Service combines a decentralized domains naming service and a decentralized Gravatar-like protocol into a new protocol called ANS. Not to be confused with ANS - Arweave Network Standards.

title: Creaton
description: Web3 Patreon/Onlyfans empowering creators via subscription revenue in real-time. Engage Fans, Build an Unstoppable Income.

title: PermaBot
description: Help to archive favourite twitter threads/posts/media on the permaweb for 200 years.

title: Mask Network
description: Mask Network brings privacy and benefits from Web3 to social media like Facebook & Twitter - with an open-sourced browser extension.

title: Permanotes
description: Permanotes is a decentralized application that allows you to create notes that will be accessible forever using the permaweb.

title: LikeCoin
description: LikeCoin decentralizes publishing. Own your content forever. Not your key, not your content.

title: RSS3
description: RSS3 is the feed for Web3. A next-generation feed standard that aims to support efficient and decentralized information distribution.

title: Permacast
description: Permacast is the protocol that lets you store your podcasts permanently on Arweave.

title: Art By City
description: Art By City is a chain-agnostic Web3 art and creative content protocol built on Arweave. The Artist's Permaweb, beyond NFTs.

title: Koii Network
description: Koii is the web of public knowledge. Attention records are open, public, and transparent, creating a shared history of what matters most.

title: ASTΞROIÐ
description: ASTΞROIÐ is a decentralized content management system (dCMS) powered by the Arweave blockchain where you truly own your data instead of the platforms hosting your content.

title: WeaveDB
description: WeaveDB is a NoSQL database powered by Warp Contracts (SmartWeave) on the Arweave blockchain. The query APIs are similar to Firestore from Google but completely decentralized.

title: Permapages
description: Create and manage your own permanent web3 profile and permaweb pages built on Arweave.

title: Stamp Protocol
description: Stamp Protocol allows users to stamp content they come across on the permaweb. New way to engage with content on the permaweb!

title: VouchDAO
description: Decentralized Verification for Arweave Wallets. VouchDAO allows users to verify once and be trusted everywhere on the Permaweb, while allowing developers to verify them with 2 lines of code.

title: BAR
description: A scarce medium of exchange for the SmartWeave ecosystem. Upload data or burn AR to get it. No bridges, no treasury to hack.

title: Usher
description: Usher is Partnerships for Web3, enabling Web3 Brands with Partner Programs that are based on Smart Contracts and integrated with Blockchains. Activating verifiability in off-chain data and processes

title: Nest.land
description: A persistent module registry for Deno, on the blockchain. You can publish your Deno modules to the permaweb, where they can never be deleted

title: Nina
description: Nina is a new infrastructure to buy, sell and stream music online. Nina is designed to solve inequity and opportunism in the music industry by providing a new model that doesn't syphon revenue from artists and helps everyone play a role in amplifying music.

title: Nifty Pixels
description: Nifty Pixels is a platform built on Polygon that lets you draw, mint, and sell pixel art NFTs. Nifty Pixels stores NFT metadata on Arweave.

title: Dojima
description: Dojima is a cross-chain infrastructure platfrom that acts as a middle-ground between multiple layer1 and layer2 blockchains which provides developers the ability to build cross-chain applications.

title: Media Network
description: Media Network is a self-governed and open-source decentralized CDN. Distributed bandwidth market that enables service providers to hire resources from the network as the demand for last-mile data delivery fluctuates.

title: Metaforo
description: Web3-Native Forum. Metaforo's vision is to connect people for decentralized communities.

title: Forward Research
description: Incubator on a mission to build a better web on Arweave. They provide an environment designed to help founders focus on what matters most: building. From zero to market fit.

title: Gitcoin
description: Funding projects, building community, and making learning resources accessible, Gitcoin are teaming up to create the digital public infrastructure of tomorrow.

title: PermaDAO
description: PermaDAO is here to help build and promote every project within the Arweave Ecosystem. They have an entire team of motivated contributors to help you in any way we can.

title: BundleDAO
description: BundleDAO gives users the ability to sign and store their content permanently on Arweave with their native-chain identity.

title: Livepeer
description: Livepeer is a decentralized video infrastructure network.

title: ECHO
description: ECHO is the first decentralized social engagement protocol based on Arweave to help collecting comments, reactions and receiving tips.

title: ArConnect
description: Secure wallet management for Arweave. ArConnect provides simple and effective way to interact with Permaweb Apps.

title: FirstBatch
description: FirstBatch is on a mission to make personalization self-sovereign, interoperable and privacy-preserving. FirstBatch is building the Universal Interest Graph to offer decentralized personalization with interoperable data while preserving user privacy.

title: Glacier Network
description: Glacier is building a fully permissionless, dynamic and scalable NoSQL database for Web3 Dapps. Glacier empowers decentralized apps to build on decentralized databases. It provides programmable data composability solutions (scalability, resilience, data security and privacy).

title: Forever Stories
description: Some stories are worth telling forever. Forever Stories provides the tools for you to publish your own story to the Permaweb.

title: Storedat.io
description: GraphQL API built on top of Web3 storage providers like Arweave and Filecoin. Providing an agnostic way to read and write data with those protocols all the while abstracting web3 away from the user. No dealing with wallets, signing transactions, managing private keys, paying transaction costs, and so on.

title: PermaMail
description: Permamail allows creating email-like fully key-to-key non-custodial encrypted conversations on base of arweave's blockweave (since arweave is not blockchain but blockweave).

title: Keystone Wallet
description: Keystone is first hardware wallet with Arweave & ArConnect support.

title: ArCode Studio
description: ArCode Studio is an online IDE for smartweave contracts. As ArCode works on the browser all the files are saved in cache memory and removed when the cache is cleared. Smartweave contracts are the Arweave smart contracts.

title: Digital History Association
description: Digital History Association perform research on the core Arweave protocol and recommend improvements, while respecting its principles and immutable characteristics. It is a Swiss non-profit association for the development and research of the Arweave protocol.

title: Alex.
description: Alex. is a decentralized archival platform that leverages the immutable and permanent data storage of Arweave.

title: Archive the Web
description: An open & permanent public web archive for everyone. Archive the Web allows users to store interactive website snapshots.

title: Arweave Hub
description: The place to find and create events all related to the Permaweb & Arweave.

title: RareWeave
description: RareWeave is a marketplace that allows for the creation, trading, and exploration of NFTs on the Arweave blockchain. Its unique NFT-Smartweave-enabled protocol enables the minting and trading of community NFTs on Arweave, making it possible to trade them against AR and any other coin natively.

title: AncientInternet.org
description: AncientInternet.org is a simplified, free, and quick way to make sure any Twitter account content can be backed up.

title: Dragon Deploy
description: Deploy your website or application folder on the Permaweb through a user-friendly interface specially designed for this purpose. Arweave Name System (ArNS) supported out of the box. Also supports React, Next, Nuxt, Vue, & ViteJS apps.

title: Streamr
description:
Streamr is a peer-to-peer pub/sub network for streaming data and real-time messaging.

Web3 projects typically see Streamr as middleware. Streamr is used inside oracles, IoT pipelines, messaging apps, and all sorts of event-driven applications.

Streamr is used as the data delivery network for the RedStone oracle and for the LogStore time series database. These applications use Streamr to deliver the data to and from Arweave for permanent storage with end-to-end decentralization.

title: Smartweaver
description:
Smartweaver is a permaweb dapp that uses babeljs to traverse smartweave contract code, pull the exposed functions and their required props, to provide users with a GUI interface for smartweave contracts. It could be considered as renderer as well with a bit of tweaking.
This enables a basic interface to contracts allow access to all functions on them.

title: Weavers
description: This is a community of Arweave enjoyers, devs and creatives exploring the Arweave ecosystem

title: JokeRace
description: Contests for communities to run, grow, and monetize. Use Arweave to store image (NOT implemented yet). Smart contracts were audited by Certik in September 2023.

title: Hansa
description: Investing, incubating, and accelerating web3 protocols since 2017. First cheque in Arweave.

title: ao
description: The ao computer is a decentralized, actor-oriented computing environment built on the Arweave network, designed to host an indefinite number of parallel processes without limitations on their size or form. It facilitates trustless and cooperative computing by allowing flexible integration of various virtual machines, security models, and payment options, all unified on a global platform. Key features include a modular architecture, message-passing standard, and the ability to run processes akin to smart contracts, offering users a scalable, secure, and customizable computing experience.

title: BazAR Marketplace
description: Bazar is the first fully decentralized atomic asset exchange built on the permaweb. Through the power of the Universal Content Marketplace (UCM) protocol and the Universal Data License (UDL) content creators can trade digital assets with real world rights.

title: DataOS
description: DataOS is an interface built on top of an open data lake (Arweave Permaweb), and could completely replace all "apps" as an OS. DataOS provides data analysis and statistics.

title: AkordJS
description: AkordJS provides developers with the Akord Vault toolkit - a system for creating digital vaults on Arweave that have the following management features: File organization, File versioning, Access control, End-to-end encryption with key rotation for collaboration, Path manifests, Private messaging, Note creation, UDL licensing, Minting of Atomic NFTs, single and collections, Importing of existing Arweave files.

title: ArSwap
description: ArSwap is a DeFi platform within the AO ecosystem, designed in collaboration with the Aetheris Project to streamline swapping processes with a user-friendly interface. Its mission is to enhance trading security and efficiency while expanding its offerings with innovative features and new token listings. ArSwap strives to enrich the AO ecosystem's DeFi options. Key features include a token faucet for free initial token acquisition and access to liquidity pools, enabling users to generate passive income.

title: Permasite
description: Save a website forever. ArDrive offers the ability to save working copies of static websites permanently on Arweave. This means that websites made on WordPress, Wix, SquareSpace and other CMS platforms can now be archived for hundreds of years without the need to pay for ongoing data storage.

title: Fileverse
description: Fileverse is a decentralized, user-controlled file storage and collaboration platform leveraging blockchain technology for security and privacy. Onchain space for collaboration and productivity. Use it to write, create a knowledge-base, sketch ideas, share files, make a public webpage and more - individually or as a group.

title: Oara network
description: Oara Network connects brands, apps, and creators in the Arweave and AO ecosystem with engaging content, creative ads, and strategic consultations to boost audience engagement.

title: SCP Ventures
description: SCP Venture focuses on the development of a decentralized and open web, utilizing Arweave's Storage-based Consensus Paradigm (SCP). This paradigm supports scalable, on-chain storage with guaranteed permanence and separates storage from computation. As a Layer0 network, Arweave aims to provide a platform that is secure and resistant to censorship, suitable for Web3 decentralized applications (DApps). SCP Ventures seeks to invest in projects that use this technology to create transparent, secure, and scalable applications in various sectors, contributing to the evolution of decentralized web infrastructure.

title: Othent
description:
Built on the Arweave blockchain, Othent leverages the permaweb to provide a simple and powerful onboarding process for Web2 users into Web3. Developers can quickly integrate Othent into their DApps, wallets, and chains, facilitating the transition from Web2 to Web3 for a broader audience.

Othent aims to integrate Web2 users into the Web3 ecosystem by providing a robust gateway that allows decentralized applications (DApps) and protocols to access Web2 users effortlessly.  Facilitates Web3 transactions through familiar Web2 interfaces, such as email-based file transfers without needing a wallet. This is exemplified by the Weave Transfer app, which enables on-chain file transfers using Google accounts.

title: ARlink
description: One-click deploy from GitHub to permaweb.

title: 0rbit
description:
Decentralized Oracle Network on Arweave. 0rbit provides any data from the web to an ao process by utilizing the power of ao, and 0rbit nodes.
The user sends a message to the 0rbit ao, 0rbit nodes fetches the data and the user process receives the data.

title: tiny4vr
description: Decentralized URL Shortener on Arweave. Create and share permanent short URLs with tiny4vr : Fully decentralized on Arweave, Permanent links that never expire, No wallet needed to use short URLs, ArConnect/Othent wallet for creating links.

title: LiquidOps
description: LiquidOps is an over-collateralised lending and borrowing protocol built on Arweave's L2 AO.

title: BetterIDEa
description:
A suite of developer tools that make it super easy to start building on AO.
Including a feature rich web IDE, Package manager for AO, Portable AO code cells.

title: Helix
description: Helix is an atomic asset uploader. Digital content uploaded through Helix can be traded on the permaweb.

title: Permaweb Cookbook
description: The Permaweb Cookbook provides easy-to-understand code snippets designed for beginners with no prior experience in blockchain or Permaweb, allowing them to quickly learn and apply the concepts.

title: Permaverse
description: The first full web3 metaverse, gaming hub and launchpad.

title: Llama Land
description: AI powered MMO game built on AO computer.

title: ArFleet
description: ArFleet enables temporary storage on Arweave to lower prices for apps to scale for their users.

title: Autonomous Finance
description: Autonomous Finance is a dedicated research and technology entity, focusing on the intricacies of financial infrastructure within the ao network.

title: AOX
description: Bridge assets to the AO ecosystem with AOX. Built by EverVision Labs.

title: aoVest
description: Token vesting for AO. AOVest helps automatically distribute tokens over specific time periods.

title: WeaveVM
description: A hyperscalable EVM network L1 focused on low-cost, permanent onchain storage and DA.

title: DecentraMind
description: DecentraMind is a web3 contribution market for real builders and a place to help projects to build better communities by progressive ownership model. In short, progressive ownership proposes a fairer and more efficient community token distribution model than the airdrop model.

title: Astro USD
description: Astro introduces USDA, an over-collateralized stablecoin developed on AO’s hyper parallel computing environment.

title: DumDumz
description: Welcome to DumDumz.xyz, your home for the #1984 piece NFT collection exclusive to the AO blockchain. You can adopt your very own DumDum on the bazaAR NFT platform.

title: WEB3 Venture Capital
description: WEB3 VC promotes the development of WEB3.0 through early investment, technical research and development support, market promotion, community operation promotion, market research and other methods.

title: Community Labs
description: Community Labs is a venture studio building and bootstrapping permanent data storage on Arweave.

title: Botega
description: Autonomous Agent-first DEX on AO computer. Advanced order types, redefined.

title: ProtocolLand
description: Decentralized, source controlled, code collaboration where you own your code. Protocol.Land integrates seamlessly with Git, keeping your typical workflow from repository creation to pushing changes remains intact, blending the new with the familiar in a streamlined experience.
